title: I am excited to be joining CentraleSupélec, University of Paris-Saclay as an Assistant Professor!
Three short papers were accepted to the Complex Networks 2017 conference, that will be held in Lyon, France, Nov 29 - Dec 1, 2017!
I will be on the program committee of WWW 2018 and AAAI 2018!
I will be teaching a new graduate-level course on Graph Mining and Network Analysis at UC San Diego, at the Spring Quarter 2017!
I am co-chair of the 2017 Information Theory and Applications (ITA) Workshop, in San Diego, February 12-17, 2017!
Our tutorial with Michalis on Graph-based Text Representations will be presented in EMNLP 2017, in Copenhagen, Denmark, September 7â€“11, 2017!
I will be on the program committee of IJCAI 2017!
Paper with Marc and Michalis accepted to the SDM 2017 conference, that will be held in Houston, Texas, April 27-29, 2017!
I am co-organizing a special session on Natural Language Processing for Social Media Analysis at SPECOM 2017, in Hatfield, England, UK!
I was invited to give a talk at the UCSD Artificial Intelligence Seminar!
I joined UC San Diego as a data science postdoctoral scholar!
I will be on the program committee of AAAI 2017!
Our demo paper has been accepted at the ICDM 2016 conference, that will be held in Barcelona, Spain, December 12-15, 2016!
